name: file-metrics
description: Free VS Code extension to view and track the largest files in your workspace by lines of code or file size. Built by the makers of Quickfix AI.

largestFiles.maxFiles.description: Maximum number of files to display in the File Metrics view
largestFiles.maxFiles.markdownDescription:
Maximum number of files to display in the File Metrics view

**Note:** Only files that meet at least one threshold (warning or danger) will be shown

**Recommended:** 20-50 files

largestFiles.excludedFolders.description: Folders to exclude from the scan (build outputs, dependencies, etc.)
largestFiles.excludedFolders.markdownDescription:
Folders to exclude from the scan

**Recommended:** Exclude build folders, dependencies, and generated code

largestFiles.fileExtensions.description: File extensions to include in the scan
largestFiles.fileExtensions.markdownDescription:
File extensions to include in the scan

**Recommended:** Include only source code files, exclude config/data files

largestFiles.colorThresholds.warningLoc.description: Lines of Code: Warning threshold (yellow indicator)
